attributes.additional_details: Look at channel 4 news on south Sudan!
attributes.background: Stop the UK media reporting children in Africa by not showing their genitals on air. Every children matters. The safety and protection of children is key! We would be outraged if this was showing in the news in the UK STOP this happening!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
